content.en: Optimizing manufacturing scheduling: Researchers are exploring the use of reinforcement learning algorithms to improve manufacturing scheduling in various ways. These algorithms, such as Q-learning and deep reinforcement learning, are being applied to tasks like batch sequencing, dispatching rule selection, and dynamic scheduling. By using these algorithms, scientists hope to enhance the efficiency and flexibility of production processes in smart factories, leading to improved productivity and adaptability.
content.da: Optimering af produktionsplanlægning: Forskere undersøger brugen af reinforcement learning-algoritmer for at forbedre produktionsplanlægning på forskellige måder. Disse algoritmer, såsom Q-learning og dyb reinforcement learning, anvendes til opgaver som batchsekventering, valg af forsendelsesregler og dynamisk planlægning. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber forskerne at øge effektiviteten og fleksibiliteten i produktionsprocesserne i smarte fabrikker, hvilket vil føre til forbedret produktivitet og tilpasningsevne.
